devdoc.details: Most simple manager to manage public vault on Arrakis V2.

returns._0: operators array of address representing operators

initManagement((address,address,uint24,u.details: onced initialize Arrakis will start to manage the initialize vault

params.params: SetupParams struct containing data for manager vault

params.operator_: address to check if it's an operator

returns._0: return true if inputed address is an operator otherwise return false

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

rebalance(address,uint24,((uint128,(int2.details: only an operator of the contract Arrakis Finance can call the contract

params.operatorMaxDeviation_: specific max deviation wanted by operator.
params.vault_: address of the Arrakis V2 vault to rebalance

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setManagerFee(address[],uint16).details: only the owner of simple manager call this function

params.managerFeeBPS_: new value of manager fee bps
params.vaults_: array of vaults where to update manager fee bps

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawAndCollectFees(address[],address.details: only the owner of the contract Arrakis Finance can call the contract

params.tokens_: array of tokens where to withdraw fees
params.vaults_: array of vaults where to collect fees

devdoc.title: SimpleManager

setManagerFee(address[],uint16).notice: Set manager fee bps as manager

withdrawAndCollectFees(address[],address.notice: Withdraw and Collect Fees generated by vaults on Uni v3
